content.text: is designed to aggregate and summarize billing data from the
table for reporting purposes. It consolidates billing information into three distinct categories: "UMB Rebill," "UMB Cancel," and "UMB Net Bill." Each category is represented by a separate

construct. The view utilizes scalar functions to determine the billing group and description based on specific parameters, and it aggregates various billing metrics such as energy consumption and demand.
The complexity of this view is considered medium due to the following factors:

to combine results, which requires careful handling of data types and nullability.
